mapper.select: /* 특정 과목합격기준점수 조회 */ SELECT sp.ls_p_score_code ,sp.li_code ,ls.li_name ,ls.ls_subject ,sp.ls_code ,sp.ls_name ,sp.ls_total_question_num ,sp.ls_p_standard_score ,sp.ls_p_score_reg_id ,sp.ls_p_score_reg_datetime FROM subject_pass_score AS sp INNER JOIN license_subject AS ls on sp.ls_code = ls.ls_code WHERE sp.ls_p_score_code = #{lsPScoreCode};
/* 특정 자격증정보 조회 */ SELECT li_p_score_code ,li_code ,li_name ,li_p_standard_score ,li_p_score_reg_id ,li_p_score_reg_datetime FROM license_pass_score WHERE li_code = #{liCode};
/* 특정 문제코드 조회 */ SELECT li_code FROM license_info WHERE li_code = #{liCode};
/* 특정 자격증 과목목록 조회 */ SELECT ls.ls_code ,ls.li_name ,ls.li_code ,ls.ls_subject ,ls.ls_name ,ls.ls_reg_id ,ls.ls_reg_datetime FROM license_subject AS ls WHERE ls.li_code = #{liCode};
/* 특정 자격증 과목정보 조회 */ SELECT ls.ls_code ,ls.li_name ,ls.ls_subject ,ls.ls_name FROM license_subject AS ls WHERE ls.ls_code = #{lsCode};

/* 자격증별 과목합격기준점수목록 조회 */ SELECT sp.ls_p_score_code ,sp.li_code ,sp.ls_code ,sp.ls_name ,sp.ls_total_question_num ,sp.ls_p_standard_score ,sp.ls_p_score_reg_id ,sp.ls_p_score_reg_datetime FROM subject_pass_score AS sp WHERE sp.li_code = #{liCode};

/* 과목합격기준점수코드 자동생성 */ SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN CONCAT(#{subjectPassScore}, '_1') ELSE CONCAT('sub_pass_score_', MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(${lsPScoreCode}, 'sub_pass_score_', -1)AS UNSIGNED))+1) END AS newCode FROM ${subjectPassScore};
